SELECT 'P' || LPAD( NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PROD_ID, 2))), 0) + 1, 9, '0' ) FROM PROD
INSERT INTO PROD(PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_LGU, PROD_BUYER, PROD_SALE, PROD_OUTLINE) VALUES(#{prodId},#{prodName}, #{prodLgu},#{prodBuyer},#{prodSale},#{prodOutline})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_ID, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_LGU, P.PROD_BUYER, P.PROD_SALE, P.PROD_OUTLINE, L.LPROD_ID, L.LPROD_GU, L.LPROD_NM, B.BUYER_ID, B.BUYER_NAME, B.BUYER_LGU FROM PROD P LEFT OUTER JOIN LPROD L ON (P.PROD_LGU = L.LPROD_GU) LEFT OUTER JOIN BUYER B ON (P.PROD_BUYER = B.BUYER_ID) ORDER BY P.PROD_ID DESC

SELECT P.PROD_ID, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_LGU, P.PROD_BUYER, P.PROD_SALE, P.PROD_OUTLINE, L.LPROD_ID, L.LPROD_GU, L.LPROD_NM, B.BUYER_ID, B.BUYER_NAME, B.BUYER_LGU FROM PROD P LEFT OUTER JOIN LPROD L ON (P.PROD_LGU = L.LPROD_GU) LEFT OUTER JOIN BUYER B ON (P.PROD_BUYER = B.BUYER_ID) WHERE P.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
SELECT NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(PROD_ID),1,4) || TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(PROD_ID),5) + 1,'000000')),#{prodLgu}||'000001') FROM PROD WHERE PROD_LGU = #{prodLgu}
SELECT BUYER_ID , BUYER_NAME FROM BUYER WHERE BUYER_LGU = #{prodLgu}
mapper.update: UPDATE PROD SET PROD_NAME = #{prodName}, PROD_LGU = #{prodLgu}, PROD_BUYER = #{prodBuyer}, PROD_SALE = #{prodSale}, PROD_OUTLINE = #{prodOutline} WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
